duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform Mammo exams as per protocol on a variety of different body parts in an efficient manner.
Complete pre-exam screening, greet patients, and assist in appropriate gowns.
Complete history forms, complete technologist exam sheet, stock rooms with required supplies, and check labs when necessary.
Verify and follow doctor’s orders in patient’s chart, initial patient chart when exam is complete, start/remove IVs when necessary, and safely administer contrast media with power injector.
Transport patients to and from ER and other Imaging areas when assistant is unavailable, move patients on and off the exam table.
Organize and prioritize patient exams for best work flow, and communicate effectively with customers - physicians, co-workers, patients, and their families.

education_certification.credential: Graduate of an AMA approved Radiography program is required.
ARRT registered with advanced registration in Mammography.
BLS with AHA or Red Cross.
Minimum of 2 years of experience is highly preferred.
Role requires full vaccination for COVID-19 based on local, state, and/or federal law or regulations (unless a medical or religious exemption is approved)
